title: Jio Financial to  launch home loans soon
description: Jio Financial Limited is set to launch home loan products after debuting their secured lending and digital banking solutions. The company, a Reliance Industries arm, is also progressing in its joint venture with BlackRock and expanding insurance offerings. The beta JioFinance app has hit 1 million downloads.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
